closed_reason: Added TestMergeDriverConflictResolution class with 6 E2E tests: scalar conflicts (newer timestamp wins), label union merge, dependency union merge, status conflicts, closed_at preservation, and multiple concurrent edits convergence.
description: Test 3-way merge scenarios: array union for labels/deps, last-write-wins for scalars, timestamp comparison. Test corrupted JSON handling.
title: E2E test: merge driver conflict resolution
